channel.title: RecklessPk #1 Spawn/PK RSPS
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2nbtts3.png[/img]
[B][I]RecklessPK, Where legends come together![/I][/B]
[SIZE=3]RecklessPK is a friendly RSPS, that cares about their players - an active community, caring staff members, combat that no other servers have.
Custom PK rating system, pking varies from mains to pures, Unique voting rewards, and more for you to figure out! [/SIZE] [URL=http://"http://www.recklesspk.com/in.php?ref=Legit_Dice"]Play RecklessPk[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.recklesspk.com/in.php?ref=Legit_Dice"]Forums[/URL]
Unique Features
- Perfect combat, with great switches for Hybrids - Instant Pking upon login - Welcoming community - Spawning - 24/7 Uptime, with no lagg - Bonus XP in a special skill, skill is different after every 48 Hours - PK server with Skilling for more options obtaining items - Skills such as summoning, hunter, farming, and so on - Fully working prayers and spells including turmoil - Automated voting and donating system - Gain PK points by doing activies such as voting, skilling or PK. You can use them to buy unique items from the PK Points shop - An amazing PK rating System - Active Forums - Weekly events with huge prizes to win - Active social media (youtube, facebook, twitter)
Media Official Youtube channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/RLPKOfficial
Other videos by players.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xlPhkyK53t8 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=32bDYACctmU https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k5SVuBdUI84 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uq4tX2TzrGs
Pictures
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/vya8w8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/e97y3d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/nly5wz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2j5yw7p.png[/img]
Please check it out by using the links above ! 200+ online 24/7 !
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=7][URL=http://"http://www.recklesspk.com/in.php?ref=Legit_Dice"]Play Now[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]
